Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45954 affecting package dnsmasq for versions less than 2.89-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-45954 affecting package dnsmasq for versions less than 2.89-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package dnsmasq is installed with version 2.86-1 or earlier
